mapper.select: select * from useinfo where ${param2} like '%${param3}%' order by num asc limit ${(param1-1)*10}, 10
select * from useinfo where num < CAST(#{num} AS UNSIGNED) order by num desc limit 1;
select * from useinfo where num > CAST(#{num} AS UNSIGNED) order by num asc limit 1
mapper.insert:
select ifnull(max(cast(num as unsigned)),0) +1 from useinfo
insert into useinfo(num, utitle, ucontent, cname,cafecode,hit) value(#{num}, #{utitle}, #{ucontent}, #{cname},#{cafecode},"0")
mapper.update: UPDATE useinfo SET utitle= #{utitle}, ucontent=#{ucontent} where num=#{num}
update useinfo set hit = hit+1 where num=#{num}
